dct_title_s: Het beloofde landt Canaan door wandelt van onsen Salichmaecker Iesu Christo neffens syne Apostelen
dct_description_sm: uytgegeven door Nicolaes Visscher ; A. Broeck sculp. ; C.J. Visscher excud.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Duytsche m√ølen" and "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, land and sea travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes illustrations of a compass rose and ships.
2 decorative cartouches with illustrations of cherubs and biblical scenes.
4 pictorial vignettes below map: [The life of Jesus Christ].
